page.title: 19Visitor's Guide (3)
page.content: THE LAKE DISTRICT AND HADRIAN'S WALL ARE ALSO CLOSE BY. NATURE RESERVES AT HAMSTERLEY FOREST, CASTLE EDEN & WASHINGTON WILD-FOWL PARK ATTRACT MANY VISITORS & THE AREA IS RICH IN COUNTRY PARKS, WALKS & PICNIC AREAS. ALSO WITHIN EASY REACH BY RAIL IS THE BEAUTIFUL MEDIEVAL WALLED CITY OF YORK WITH ITS MAGNIFICENT MINSTER, THE SHAMBLES, JORVIK CENTRE & NATIONAL RAILWAY MUSEUM AS ITS PRIME ATTRACTIONS. FOR THE VISITOR WITH SPORT IN MIND THERE IS A TREMENDOUS VARIETY AVAILABLE IN THE AREA, INCLUDING ALL MANNER OF INDOOR & OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES INCLUDING GOLF, FISHING, SAILING & SWIMMING. HOTEL & GUEST HOUSE ACCOMODATION IS GOOD & VARIED TO SUIT ALL TASTES & POCKETS.
